cs.title: Samsung
cs.text:
Samsung S8 and later:
1. Go to Settings > Device Maintenance > Battery
2. Scroll to Unmonitored apps > tap on the three dots menu
3. Add the Runtastic app to the list

Other Samsung phones:
1. Go to Phone settings > Applications > tap on the three dots menu
2. Select Special Access > Optimize Battery usage
3. Deselect Runtastic app from the list

]]>
